text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6” 4K UHD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core Intel Core i7 4700HQ 2.40GHz (3.40Ghz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6” 4K UHD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core Intel Core i7 4700HQ 2.40GHz (3.40Ghz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit since day one. performance throttles under load and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6” 4K UHD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core Intel Core i7 4700HQ 2.40GHz (3.40Ghz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 860 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6” 4K UHD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core Intel Core i7 4700HQ 2.40GHz (3.40Ghz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6” 4K UHD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core Intel Core i7 4700HQ 2.40GHz (3.40Ghz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 256GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 2GB, Windows 8.1 64-Bit since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
